pageProps.title: Pros and Cons of Working Freelance in Real Estate Photography
pageProps.metaDesc: Real estate photography is a highly specialized niche within the photography industry that focuses on capturing the best possible images of properties for use in marketing materials. Many photographers who specialize in this area choose to work freelance, rather than as employees of a real estate agency or other company. There are several pros to working freelance in real estate photography, including greater flexibility, the ability to set your own rates, and the opportunity to work with a variety of clients.
